Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority to develop and maintain an application compatible with mobile cellular devices for electric vehicle charging stations
Summary: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority to develop and maintain an application compatible with mobile cellular devices to give directions to the nearest electric vehicle charging station.
LawCode: Add ยง1884, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to mobile cellular devices
